column2: "Alright, I've talked about the outside world up until we got here."
"The [Profound Darkness] will revive. \"Annihilation is inevitable.\", is what I intend to say."
"To that world where naught but anguish exists... will you still return?"
"Then you should leave. This is the edge of space."
"Pick up Clarissa, and gather your power. Just like when you defeat and devour Darkers."
"It's impossible for me, but possible for you. You are, after all, ARKS."
"Now go, and enjoy that uncertain world as much as you can."
